This proposal is submitted to answer a call for translations of the {data.table} package as detailed \[here\](<https://rdatatable-community.github.io/The-Raft/posts/2023-10-17-translation_announcement-toby_hocking/>).

## Goal

-   Translation of all messages of the {data.table} package in French (from its `R-data.table.pot` and `data.table.pot` files, that is, 1285 messages for {data.table} version 1.15.99, commit 65212df on 2024-04-24)

-   Translation of all vignettes in French (12 `.Rmd`\` files for same version of {data.table})
